mapper.insert: UPDATE mishu_write.tb_click_statistics SET click_count=#{addCount} WHERE innert_id=#{id} AND source=#{source}
mapper.select:
SELECT cand.nt_id AS id, cand.title, cand.pub_date AS opendate, cand.snatch_id as snatchId, cand.f_candidate AS oneName, cand.f_quote AS oneOffer, cand.source FROM tb_nt_bids_cand cand WHERE cand.f_candidate LIKE CONCAT('%',#{com_name},'%')
and cand.title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
ORDER BY cand.pub_date DESC

select count(1) from tb_nt_bids_cand cand where cand.f_candidate LIKE CONCAT('%',#{com_name},'%')
and cand.title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')

SELECT mian.pkid as id, mian.`seg_count` as block, mian.title, bids.f_candidate as oneName, bids.f_quote as oneOffer, mian.pub_date as opendate, , mian.source, mian.nt_category as type, mian.url, CONCAT((SELECT twf.name FROM mishu.`twf_dict` twf WHERE twf.code=#{provice}),(SELECT sys.area_name FROM sys_area sys WHERE sys.area_code=#{city})) AS projDq FROM tb_nt_mian_${source} mian left JOIN tb_nt_bids_${source} bids ON mian.`pkid` = bids.`nt_id` WHERE mian.pkid=#{id}

SELECT mian.pkid AS id, mian.`title`, mian.`pub_date` AS opendate, mian.`city_code`, common.name AS pbMode, , tenders.qua_name AS zzRank, mian.snatch_id AS snatchId, mian.nt_category as type, mian.url, CONCAT((SELECT twf.name FROM mishu.`twf_dict` twf WHERE twf.code=#{provice}),(SELECT sys.area_name FROM sys_area sys WHERE sys.area_code=#{city})) AS projDq FROM tb_nt_mian_${source} mian JOIN tb_nt_tenders_${source} tenders ON mian.pkid = tenders.nt_id LEFT JOIN dic_common common ON tenders.`pb_mode` = common.`code` WHERE mian.pkid = #{id}
mapper.sql: ( case mian.biness_type when '01' then '施工' when '02' then '监理' when '03' then '设计' when '04' then '勘察' when '05' then '采购' when '06' then '其他' when '07' then 'PPP' when '08' then '设计施工' when '09' then 'EPC' when '10' then '检测' when '11' then '施工采购' when '12' then '造价咨询' when '13' then '招标代理' else '其他' end) as projectType

( case mian.provice_code when 'beij' then '北京' when 'tianj' then '天津市' when 'hebei' then '河北省' when 'sanx' then '山西省' when 'neimg' then '内蒙古自治区' when 'liaon' then '辽宁省' when 'jil' then '吉林省' when 'heilj' then '黑龙江省' when 'shangh' then '上海市' when 'jiangs' then '江苏省' when 'jiangs' then '浙江省' when '12' then '安徽省' when '13' then '福建省' when '13' then '江西省' when '13' then '江西省' when '13' then '河南省' when '13' then '湖北省' when '13' then '广东省' when '13' then '广西壮族自治区' when '13' then '海南省' when '13' then '重庆市' when '13' then '四川省' when '13' then '贵州省' when '13' then '云南省' when '13' then '陕西省' when '13' then '甘肃省' when '13' then '青海省' when '13' then '宁夏回族自治区' when '13' then '湖南省' when '13' then '新疆维吾尔自治区' when '13' then '西藏自治区' else '详情见原文' end) as province
